alert.note: Alert for Cannon; Rutherford; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 6:22PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rutherford, southeastern Wilson and northwestern Cannon Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 622 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Watertown to near Smyrna. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Lebanon, Woodbury, Smyrna, La Vergne, Nolensville, Watertown, Walterhill, Auburntown, Lascassas, Tuckers Crossroads, Cedars Of Lebanon State Park, Rockvale, Bradyville, Milton and Readyville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
